name: Savage
description: A raw and untamed fragrance with fresh citrus, spicy notes, and a rugged woody base.

name: YOU Intensely
description: A bold blend of woods, spice, and warm amber.

name: YOU Absolutely
description: A rich, elegant blend of fruity notes, soft florals, and a creamy musk finish.

name: YOU Gold
description: A radiant blend of warm amber, soft florals, and a touch of sweet vanilla.

name: YOU Oud
description: A luxurious fusion of smoky oud, rich spices, and a hint of velvety amber.

name: YOU Only
description: A delicate harmony of fresh citrus, soft florals, and a gentle musk undertone.

name: THOMAS KOSMALA N.4
description: A captivating blend of warm amber, creamy vanilla, and a touch of musk, exuding effortless sophistication.

name: THOMAS KOSMALA N.10
description: A bold and vibrant fusion of citrus, spicy woods, and deep musk, leaving a dynamic, lasting impression.

name: TOM FORD WHITE SUEDE
description: A luxurious blend of musk, warm amber, and velvety suede, softened with delicate floral notes.

name: TOM FORD CAFE ROSE
description: A seductive blend of rich coffee, dark rose, and warm spices, layered with smoky oud and patchouli.

name: TOM FORD LAVENDER EX
description: Tom Ford Lavender Extreme: A bold reimagining of lavender, intensified with bright citrus, warm tonka bean, and deep woody undertones.

name: TOM FORD COSTA AZZ
description: Tom Ford Costa Azzurra: A fresh, coastal blend of crisp citrus, aromatic herbs, and warm woods, evoking a Mediterranean escape.

name: BlEU DE CHANNEL 1
description: Bleu de Chanel Parfum: A refined blend of woody cedar, warm amber, and aromatic freshness, embodying timeless elegance and sophistication.

name: BlEU DE CHANNEL 2
description: Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum: A sophisticated fusion of woody amber, fresh citrus, and aromatic notes, exuding depth and refinement.

name: Jean Paul Gaultier 1
description: Jean Paul Gaultier Le Male Elixir: A bold and sensual blend of rich vanilla, spicy amber, and aromatic lavender, intensified with a smoky undertone.

name: Jean Paul Gaultier 2
description: Jean Paul Gaultier Le Beau Le Parfum: A seductive mix of creamy tonka bean, fresh coconut, and warm amber, wrapped in an aromatic woody base.

name: Jean Paul Gaultier 3
description: Jean Paul Gaultier Le Beau: A fresh and seductive blend of crisp bergamot, creamy coconut, and sensual tonka bean on a woody base.

name: Jean Paul Gaultier 4
description: Jean Paul Gaultier Le Beau Paradise Garden: A vibrant blend of juicy pear, lush green notes, and creamy tonka bean, evoking a tropical escape.

name: Jean Paul Gaultier 5
description: Jean Paul Gaultier Le Male Eau de Parfum: A captivating blend of spicy cardamom, aromatic lavender, and warm vanilla, enveloped in sensual woods.

name: Carolina Herrera 1
description: Carolina Herrera Good Girl New York Swarovski Limited Edition: A dazzling blend of sweet jasmine, rich tonka bean, and creamy cocoa, housed in a sparkling Swarovski-studded stiletto.

name: Carolina Herrera 2
description: Carolina Herrera Very Good Girl Glam Eau de Parfum: A bold and sparkling blend of juicy cherry, elegant rose, and warm almond, finished with a touch of vibrant vetiver.

name: Carolina Herrera 3
description: Carolina Herrera Very Good Girl Eau de Parfum: A captivating blend of tangy red currant, romantic rose, and warm vanilla, exuding modern elegance.

name: Carolina Herrera 4
description: Carolina Herrera Good Girl Supreme Eau de Parfum: A daring blend of juicy berries, seductive jasmine, and creamy tonka bean, with a bold touch of vetiver.

name: Carolina Herrera 5
description: Carolina Herrera Good Girl Fantastic Pink: A glamorous blend of sweet jasmine, rich tonka bean, and creamy cocoa, wrapped in a sparkling pink stiletto-shaped bottle.

name: Dolce & Gabbana
description: Dolce & Gabbana Devotion: A captivating blend of candied citrus, fresh orange blossom, and warm vanilla, symbolizing universal love in a stunning Sacred Heart bottle.

name: So Scandal Gaultier
description: So Scandal! by Jean Paul Gaultier: A bold and seductive blend of juicy raspberry, creamy tuberose, and sweet jasmine, with a touch of milky warmth.

name: Scandal Gaultier
description: Scandal by Jean Paul Gaultier: A daring blend of sweet honey, seductive gardenia, and warm patchouli, exuding bold femininity.

name: ARVEA NATURE
description: ARVEA Nature Girl: A fresh, fruity-floral blend of mandarin, magnolia, and musk, perfect for vibrant and adventurous women.
